column4: i am using ubuntu on a macbook and i want to define keys for the infraret remote control. but xev doesnt show keycodes for most of the buttons, but some kind of events. they work find with rhythmplayer, but i dont want to use them as media buttons... what app is responsible for that?
i think if you type dmesg after hitting the key, it will give you a command for setkeycodes
but the keycode business does the trick, thanks
